results.name: Infinite lower triangular matrix with (1, 2, 3,...) in the main diagonal, (1, 1, 1,...) in the subdiagonal and the rest zeros.
comment: Eigensequence of the triangle = A001040 starting (1, 3, 10, 43, 225,...). [From _Gary W. Adamson_, Dec 29 2008]
